name: Valentine Michael
reviewTitle: It worked great on my 2010 explorer limited v6 4x4 but the abs speed censor didn't work with my wiring harness, not sure what the issue was. I wound up spoofing the old connector to the new wire, it works like a charm now.

name: Noel Ryan
reviewTitle: I had to change out the serpentine belt on one of my vehicles, and of course such a simple job required me to remove the front passenger wheel and plastic mud guard behind the wheel in order to access the belt. I miss the good ole days when the belt was right up front and took all of five minutes to replace….but I digress.

name: Howell Flynn
reviewTitle: I was excited to get these as I have 5 cars with so many drivers in my house. Bought them specifically for a project on my son’s Prius. I found fasteners in the box that worked but I had to remove some to make adjustments to something and that is when I discovered how cheap the plastic was. The heads just crumbled under any amount of pressure to remove.
